channel.title: Error help

item.title: Error help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

could somebody fix the error here please

if(usingBow && !usingOtherRangeWeapons && !c.usingMagic || usingCross || usingCross) { // range hit delay if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] >= 4212 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] <= 4223) { c.rangeItemUsed = c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]; c.crystalBowArrowCount++; if else(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] >= 1524); c.rangeItemUsed = c.playerEquipment[c.playerHandcannon]; c.getItems().deleteHandcannonshot(); if else(c.rangeItemUsed = c.playerEquipment[c.playerArrows]; c.getItems().deleteArrow(); }

My IDE keeps saying I need another ; but I know thats wrong

Read full topic
